sentences: Saksa ristir체체tlid hakkasid 13. sajandil Eestis kanda kinnitama.
V채ike laps ei suuda veel kanda iseseisvalt.
P천randal saab paremini kanda kui pehmel pinnasel.
context: The Estonian word 'kanda' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can mean to carry or transport something physically (like carrying a bag), to wear clothing or accessories, to bear weight or responsibility, or to support/hold something in place. In the dictionary definition provided, it also appears in the phrase 'kanda kinnitama' which means to establish oneself firmly or to gain a foothold somewhere.
